Articles.Content:
everyone realizes that Alexander the Great has terrible weapons compared to today so nobody takes him seriously

democratic hill

oh and if ATG attacks us we have the combined armies of the US, Russia, China, and Disney to defend us

Make FYROM great again! I give Alexander the Great a crash course on modern weapons. Know he can conquer the most powerful countries really quickly. Oh you were two late. I joined NATO and the EU and I applied to make BRICS into BRIMCS. I have conquer all of the former Yugoslavia republics, Bulgaria, Romania, Turkey, Greece, Iraq, and Iran

My Empire! 

FYROM = Former Yugoslav Republic Of Macedonia

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-29T17:29:00Z" title="11/29/2016 05:29  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 29, 2016</time> by ThaZeus**
  
FYROM
I nuke the hill. my crater.

I make a sandwich and sit on it in my closet.

My sandwich "hill."

after you eat the sandwich i aztec sacrifice you, but instead of the heart, i rip out your stomach

my ATP from a sandwich

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, jake9039 said:
> 
> 
> I nuke the hill. my crater.
> 

I defuse the nuke midair (I [have experience](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/61949-survive-that-attack/&do=findComment&comment=2762473) in this field) and turn said hill into a thermonuclear missile launch silo.

> 
> 
> Just now, StupidAndy said:
> 
> 
> after you eat the sandwich i aztec sacrifice you, but instead of the heart, i rip out your stomach
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my ATP from a sandwich
> 

Gah. I'm sure I have a biological reconstructor somewhere in here...

I take hairspray and fill your room with it. The bitter taste kills you outright. I then cut you open (Because people seem to like doing that to other people) and fill your intestines with hairspray, and I fill your lungs with hairspray, and I fill your stomach and your veins with hairspray. Oh, and I also take your silo (and nukes) and launch them at all the major fault lines on the planet, triggering a cataclysmic worldwide super-earthquake, rendering every structure ever created into dust. I create a rip in spacetime and bring all of the gasoline, kerosene, and butane ever formed into my possession, and I burn said dust. The planet is now a molten slag, and I perish laughing, standing among the broken bodies and ruined buildings that used to dominate this massive world. 

Nobodies hills

i landed on duna before the world blew up, so I'm on duna

my duna

> 
> 
> 34 minutes ago, StupidAndy said:
> 
> 
> i landed on duna before the world blew up, so I'm on duna
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my duna
> 

And I am currently dead, so I can't do anything

Your duna

I replace Duna with a fish.

My tuna

Luckily I trapped all posters after me in The Mirror Dimension without a sling-ring. 

My Empire (and its many hills.)

I, having the right to do so, make a sandwich. I don't do anything with it, I just have it.

My sandwich

i eat the sandwich

my stomach

uh oh, this could get ugly!!!

Dang right it is.

I rip the sandwich out of your stomach like the Mayans pulled the heart out of their sacrifices.

Too much?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-11-30T22:34:22Z" title="11/30/2016 10:34  PM" data-short="7 yr">November 30, 2016</time> by The Raging Sandwich**
well i said something like that two days ago so...no! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Aah, good.

My half-digested sandwich.

Dog saw it laying on the floor, so he ate it.

My now-clean kitchen floor.

He barfs it back up so I eat it so no one else can have it.

Good Lord, this got disgusting.

Disgusting or not, you didn't claim the location.

Therefore, My kitchen floor

I sneak in and take your kitchen floor as you sleep. Nothing else, just the whole dang floor.

My floor.

I retrieve my floor, and relocate it to Floor 1471 of the Really, Really Tall Building thread.

My Really, Really Tall Building

> 
> 
> 57 minutes ago, Xorth Tanovar said:
> 
> 
> My Really, Really Tall Building
> 

I dispute this claim of ownership in Floor 1472 in the court case *Turtle and Sandwich v. Tanovar* (gee, was that a weird name) [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/34911-really-really-really-tall-building/&do=findComment&comment=2871222](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/34911-really-really-really-tall-building/&do=findComment&comment=2871222).

My court proceedings. Also I start selling lemonade again.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-01T20:59:15Z" title="12/01/2016 08:59  PM" data-short="7 yr">December 1, 2016</time> by greenTurtle1134**
  
Link to parallel post in Really Really Tall Building.

Sorry, does nobody remember that everyone except for [@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/) is dead?

[@StupidAndy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/171175-stupidandy/)s everything

Except that I regenerate into a better, sexier me, and I use a good deal of toilet paper and milk to take over the rocky planets in the solar system

My rocky planets

i escape to planet nine, which is some sort of mini-neptune... sopovesly 

my mini neptune 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-12-02T02:52:11Z" title="12/02/2016 02:52  AM" data-short="7 yr">December 2, 2016</time> by StupidAndy**

I drop a giant black monolith orbiting Jupiter onto Planet 9. If you watched/read 2010: Odyssey Two, you know what happens next.

My star.
